mapper.select: select l.LV_SEQ, l.LV_TITLE, l.LV_CONTENT, l.LV_DATE, m.MB_ID, l.LV_CNT, m.MB_name from TBL_LEVEL_COMMUNITY_${level} l INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m on l.mb_id = m.mb_id order by LV_SEQ ASC

select round((m.challenge_total - sum(c.pay_money) )/m.challenge_total*100) from tbl_member m, tbl_member_challenge c where m.mb_id = c.mb_id and pay_date between '22/08/01' and '22/09/07' and m.mb_id = #{mb_id} group by m.mb_id,m.challenge_total

select round(avg(a),1) from (select m.mb_level, m.mb_id,(m.challenge_total - sum(c.pay_money) )/m.challenge_total*100 a from tbl_member m, tbl_member_challenge c where m.mb_id = c.mb_id and pay_date between '22/08/01' and '22/09/07' group by m.mb_level, m.mb_id,m.challenge_total) where mb_level = ${mb_level} group by mb_level

select distinct m.mb_name,round((m.challenge_total - sum(c.pay_money) )/m.challenge_total*100,1) a from tbl_member m, tbl_member_challenge c where m.mb_id = c.mb_id and pay_date between '22/08/01' and '22/09/07' and m.mb_level = ${mb_level} group by m.mb_name,m.challenge_total order by a desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_LEVEL_COMMUNITY_${level} (lv_seq, lv_title, lv_content, lv_date, mb_id, lv_cnt) VALUES (TBL_LEVEL_COMMUNITY_${level}_SEQ.nextval,#{lv_title}, #{lv_content}, sysdate, #{mb_id},0)
mapper.select: select l.LV_SEQ, l.LV_TITLE, l.LV_CONTENT, l.LV_DATE, l.mb_id, m.mb_name, l.LV_cnt from TBL_LEVEL_COMMUNITY_${level} l INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER m on l.mb_id = m.mb_id where LV_SEQ = #{lv_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_level_community_${level} set lv_title = #{lv_title}, lv_content= #{lv_content} where lv_seq= #{lv_seq}
mapper.select: Select l.lv_seq, l.lv_cmt_seq, l.lv_cmt_content,l.mb_id, m.mb_name from tbl_level_comment_${level} l inner join TBL_MEMBER m on l.mb_id = m.mb_id where LV_SEQ = #{lv_seq}
